alert.note: Alert for Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 6:57PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Graham County through 745 PM MST... At 657 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Safford Regional Airport, or near Safford, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Safford, Thatcher, Safford Regional Airport, Pima and Central. This includes the following highways... Route 70 between mile markers 327 and 343. Route 191 between mile markers 119 and 120. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
